item.title: Hailey Bieber’s Vogue Cover Story Confirms Motherhood Changes Women For The Better
item.description: Bieber quickly discovered that motherhood changes women. The good news is, that change is almost always for the better.

item.title: Congress Closer To Defunding Planned Parenthood After House Passes ’Big Beautiful Bill’
item.description: The bill states any nonprofit that 'provides for abortions' and received more than $1 million in 2024 is off limits for future funding.
